licensing.3: Driving without valid license - Rs.5,000 fine
licensing.5: Permanent license valid for 20 years (non-transport) or 3 years (transport)
licensing.6: International driving permit for driving abroad
licensing.7: Disqualification for drunk driving, rash driving, or causing death

insurance.10: Third-party insurance mandatory for all vehicles
insurance.11: Driving without insurance - Rs.2,000 fine and/or 3 months imprisonment
insurance.12: Comprehensive insurance covers own damage and third-party liability
insurance.13: No-fault liability - Rs.50,000 for death, Rs.25,000 for grievous injury
insurance.14: Hit and run cases - Rs.2 lakh for death, Rs.50,000 for grievous injury from Motor Accident Fund

traffic_violations.22: Using mobile while driving - Rs.1,000-5,000 fine
traffic_violations.24: Not wearing helmet (two-wheeler) - Rs.1,000 fine and license suspension
traffic_violations.25: Overloading - Rs.2,000 fine per extra passenger/ton

drunk_driving.30: Drunk driving (first offense) - Rs.10,000 fine and/or 6 months imprisonment
drunk_driving.31: Drunk driving (second offense) - Rs.15,000 fine and/or 2 years imprisonment
drunk_driving.33: Refusal to give breath test - Same penalty as drunk driving
drunk_driving.34: License suspension for 6 months on first offense

accidents.40: Duty to report accident causing injury/death to police
accidents.41: Duty to provide medical aid to accident victim
accidents.42: Leaving accident scene without reporting - 6 months imprisonment and/or fine
accidents.43: Rash and negligent driving causing death - 5 years imprisonment and fine up to Rs.10 lakh
accidents.44: Rash and negligent driving causing injury - 6 months imprisonment and/or Rs.5,000 fine

compensation.50: Motor Accident Claims Tribunal for compensation claims
compensation.51: Compensation for death - Based on age, income, dependency
compensation.52: Compensation for permanent disability - Based on loss of earning capacity
compensation.53: Compensation for temporary disability - Loss of income during recovery
compensation.56: Claim must be filed within 6 months of accident

vehicle_standards.61: Vehicle fitness certificate for vehicles over 15 years
vehicle_standards.62: Modification of vehicles requires RTO approval

juvenile_driving.70: Juvenile driving (under 18) - Guardian liable, Rs.25,000 fine and 3 years imprisonment
